channel.title: How To Make Items In MineCraft
channel.description:
- [b]How To Make Items In MineCraft[/b]
[b]Bed[/b]: [i][You Need: [u]3[/u] Wool + [u]3[/u] Wooden Planks][/i] [IMG]http://i536.photobucket.com/albums/ff330/jonasalan/Bed.jpg[/img]
[b]Torch[/b]: [i][You Need: [u]1[/u] Coal + [u]1[/u] Stick][/i] [IMG]http://i536.photobucket.com/albums/ff330/jonasalan/Torch.jpg[/img]
[b]Crafting Table[/b]: [i][You Need: [u]4[/u] Wooden Planks][/i] [IMG]http://i536.photobucket.com/albums/ff330/jonasalan/CraftingTable.jpg[/img]
[b]Furnace[/b]: [i][You Need: [u]8[/u] Cobblestones][/i] [IMG]http://i536.photobucket.com/albums/ff330/jonasalan/Furnace.jpg[/img]
[b]Door[/b]: [i][You Need: [u]6[/u] Wooden Planks Or [u]6[/u] Iron Ingots][/i] [IMG]http://i536.photobucket.com/albums/ff330/jonasalan/Door.jpg[/img]
[b]Glass[/b]: [i][You Need: [u]1[/u] Furnace, Sand And Coal][/i] [IMG]http://i536.photobucket.com/albums/ff330/jonasalan/Glass.jpg[/img]
[b]Stairs[/b]: [i][You Need: [u]6[/u] Wooden Planks][/i] [IMG]http://i536.photobucket.com/albums/ff330/jonasalan/Stairs.jpg[/img]
[b]Fence[/b]: [i][You Need: [u]6[/u] Sticks][/i] [IMG]http://i536.photobucket.com/albums/ff330/jonasalan/Fence.jpg[/img]
[b]Rail[/b]: [i][You Need: [u]6[/u] Ignots And 1 Stick][/i] [IMG]http://i536.photobucket.com/albums/ff330/jonasalan/Rail.jpg[/img]
[b]MineCart[/b]: [i][You Need: [u]5[/u] Iron Ignots][/i] [IMG]http://i536.photobucket.com/albums/ff330/jonasalan/Minecart.jpg[/img]
[b]Sign[/b]: [i][You Need: [u]6[/u] Wooden Planks And [i]1[/i] Stick][/i] [IMG]http://i536.photobucket.com/albums/ff330/jonasalan/Sign.jpg[/img]
[b]Trapdoor[/b]: [i][You Need: [u]6[/u] Wooden Planks][/i] [IMG]http://i536.photobucket.com/albums/ff330/jonasalan/Trapdoor.jpg[/img]
[b]Slab[/b]: [i][You Need: [u]3[/u] Wooden Planks Or Wooden Planks Or Stone Or Sandstone Or Cobblestone][/i] [IMG]http://i536.photobucket.com/albums/ff330/jonasalan/Slab.jpg[/img]

item.title: How To Make Items In MineCraft
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

xx matty xx:

This is disgusting, I’m sitting here unable to make any of these items because you don’t show us how to make a crafting bench without a crafting bench. I expect the solution and an apology ASAP.

[quote=“AlanWalk, post:1, topic:399993”]Crafting Table: [You Need: 4 Wooden Planks]
[/quote]

Think of that, except smaller!

Read full topic
item.source: How To Make Items In MineCraft

item.title: How To Make Items In MineCraft
item.dc:creator: @AlanWalk AlanWalk
item.description:
@AlanWalk wrote:

[quote=“PLayRooney, post:7, topic:399993”]Your showing them how to make a crafting bench inside a crafting bench? you need to show us how to make the crafting bench in our inventory.[/quote]Oh, forgot that I’ll add it asp when I get on my computer.

Read full topic

item.title: How To Make Items In MineCraft
item.dc:creator: @asyo4 asyo4
item.description:
@asyo4 wrote:

[quote=“AlanWalk, post:5, topic:399993”][quote author=asyo4 link=topic=497092.msg3634726#msg3634726 date=1308515576]
This honestly wasn’t necessary, and it doesn’t even contain all of the items to craft.
[/quote] I will add more items soon.[/quote]
There is already a reliable source of information which is the minecraft wiki, I see no purpose in recreating which is already created (and finished). In my eyes, and many others, this thread has no purpose.

Read full topic

item.title: How To Make Items In MineCraft
item.dc:creator: @AlanWalk AlanWalk
item.description:
@AlanWalk wrote:

  • How To Make Items In MineCraft

Bed: [You Need: 3 Wool + 3 Wooden Planks]

Torch: [You Need: 1 Coal + 1 Stick]

Crafting Table: [You Need: 4 Wooden Planks]

Furnace: [You Need: 8 Cobblestones]

Door: [You Need: 6 Wooden Planks Or 6 Iron Ingots]

Glass: [You Need: 1 Furnace, Sand And Coal]

Stairs: [You Need: 6 Wooden Planks]

Fence: [You Need: 6 Sticks]

Rail: [You Need: 6 Ignots And 1 Stick]

MineCart: [You Need: 5 Iron Ignots]

Sign: [You Need: 6 Wooden Planks And 1 Stick]

Trapdoor: [You Need: 6 Wooden Planks]

Slab: [You Need: 3 Wooden Planks Or Wooden Planks Or Stone Or Sandstone Or Cobblestone]

Read full topic
item.source: How To Make Items In MineCraft
